name: American Smash Burger
description: A delicious American smash burger recipe featuring grilled beef patty, melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and sweet caramelized onions.
fun_fact: A classic burger topped with cheese, bacon, and caramelized onions on a toasted brioche bun.
instructions: Grill beef patties to desired doneness.
Melt 2 slices of cheese on top of each patty.
Caramelize onions in a pan with olive oil until golden brown.
Add crispy bacon on top of the burger.
Assemble burgers by spreading mayonnaise or ketchup on the bottom bun, followed by lettuce, tomato, and finally the beef patty topped with cheese and onions.
Add a tablespoon of sesame seeds on top before assembling the burger.
Add grated cheese on top of the patty before grilling.
Fry 3 slices of bacon and place them between the beef patty and the cheese after they are grilled but before adding the onions.
